long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iFormatter lets you  minify & beautify your source code. 

By switching on the Beautify Switch you can Beautify the source code and by switching Off Beautify Switch you can Minify the source code. It supports a range of XML, CSS and JSON formats for all your web development needs.
